name: tickytack
description: Time tracking app replicating JIRA ClockWork functionality

scripts.test: bun test --env-file=.env.test --coverage --timeout 120000 packages/tests packages/services packages/db packages/api
scripts.test:e2e: cd packages/e2e && bun run seed && SKIP_SEED=1 PATH=$HOME/.local/node/bin:$PATH ./node_modules/.bin/playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: cd packages/e2e && bun run seed && SKIP_SEED=1 PATH=$HOME/.local/node/bin:$PATH ./node_modules/.bin/playwright test --ui

author: gjovanov
